summary: Updated OpenTelemetry configuration to match official Observe documentation: changed port from 4317 to 4318, protocol from gRPC to HTTP/protobuf, added required environment variables (OTEL_TRACES_EXPORTER, OTEL_METRICS_EXPORTER, OTEL_LOGS_EXPORTER, OTEL_PHP_AUTOLOAD_ENABLED). Configuration verified and working.
current_status: OpenTelemetry configured per official Observe documentation. Ready to send traces to Observe Agent on port 4318.
